alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Butts, northwestern Jasper and southeastern Newton Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Eudora, or near Monticello, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Monticello, Flovilla, Stewart, Calvin, Eudora, Turtle Cove, Worthville, North Alcovy, Indian Springs State Park, Fincherville and Stark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
